creator: Crayola LLC
descriptionHtml:
Introducing Crayola Create and Play, the best coloring and learning game for kids!

Learning games have never been more fun. Dive into Create and Play for fun, interactive, and educational games for kids!

Create & Play provides a safe space to develop skills through imaginative and educational coloring games for kids on most digital devices through one paid subscription account. Each of the thoughtfully designed activities for kids, sparks their imaginations and helps develop beneficial skills, including coding, logic, coloring, drawing, reading, letters, dexterity, creative thinking, cause and effect, pet care, color theory, and many more.

PLAY WITH A PURPOSE:
- Inspired by STEAM and STEM education techniques
- Crayola believes in experiential learning through playing games
- Complete coloring and drawing activities to upgrade your pets and unlock more fun adventures
- Draw and experiment with new colors
- Learn about letters and color mixing

EXCITING KIDS GAMES & ACTIVITIES WITH MORE TO COME!
- Games for kids age 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8
- Coloring games for kids
- Learning letters, coloring, drawing

CREATE one-of-a-kind masterpieces in the Art Station.
- Color, draw, stamp, paint, and more!
- Draw fun pictures and save them to your collection

CARE for imaginative creatures in the Pet Park.
- Design, nurture, and interact with animated pets.

EXPERIMENT, discover, and play in the Color Lab.
- Learn about colors and mix and match to create your own

CHALLENGE high scores on a variety of games in the Arcade.
- Play, compete, and win!
- Fun games for kids to help learn

LEARN and practice new skills in the Discovery Classroom.
- Try coding, get puzzled, and stay curious!
- Learn coding through fun activities

Subscription Details
A 7 day free trial is included with subscriptions. Subscription options include Monthly or Yearly periods. Monthly subscriptions are charged once per month and Yearly subscriptions are charged once per year. Subscriptions are charged at the beginning of the current period and auto-renewed 24 hours before the next period. With a 7 day free trial, your account is charged on the 7th day for the period which will begin on the 8th day.

• Payment will be charged to Google Play account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

Privacy Policy: www.crayola.com/app-privacy
Terms of Service: www.crayola.com/app-terms-of-use
If you have any questions, please visit www.crayola.com/support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s the most wonderful time of the year, and we’re celebrating with our first-ever Creativity Countdown!

Every day through December 24th, open the app to receive a very special gift! I wonder what’s inside today’s gift? A new holiday art activity? A festive pet accessory? Maybe some peaceful pixel art!

The gift of creativity makes every day merry and bright. Happy Holidays, from all of your friends at Crayola Create & Play.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: It’s a brand new day in Crayola Create & Play! Explore an all-new interactive world of creativity! All of your favorite activities are here — plus some exciting new ones! Stroll down Main Street, hike through the woods or roam into a jungle. Players can also craft one-of-a-kind rockets and kites in the new Craftables activity. Or, go on a special QUEST to find all of the new Spring items! All this and more in our biggest update since launch!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Join us for Camp Create & Play: June 24 - June 30! During this special event week, we're unlocking camp-themed activities and exciting limited-time content. There's something new to play for free EVERY DAY!
CAMP ACTIVITIES:

• Craftables
• Mold Making
• Colouring Pages
• Pixel Art
• Colour Critters
• Pet Dance-Off
• Glow Art

Earn a special sticker for each activity and unlock a summer camp accessory for your pets! Come create with us and enjoy a summer full of productive play!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re throwing a special birthday celebration of Crayola’s 64 Crayon box! From July 14th – August 14th, join the fun with new coloring pages, pet accessories and a special, limited-time quest! Can you find all the candles for the birthday cake?
And don’t forget to join us from July 15th – July 17th for an Ice Cream Party! Can you beat your high score in Scoop Stacks? Celebrate Ice Cream Day in style this summer and cool off with some sweet ice cream activities!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Rawwwr! Dinosaur craftables have arrived in Crayola's Create & Play. Choose from different bones and design your very own, one-of-a-kind Dinosaur. It’s Dino-Mite!

But that's not all! Meet your new companions, Scribble, Prism and Huey! They're so excited to meet you! Find them all and complete the brand new quest for a special reward.

Speaking of rewards, players can now earn daily rewards in Crayola’s Create & Play. Try to collect them all!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Trick-or-treat! We’re celebrating the spookiest holiday of the year with brand new activities and limited-time Halloween content!

Attend the first-ever Create & Play Halloween Carnival! Create fun masks, pick out an adorable costume, and trick-or-treat your way to the all new Halloween Carnival Quest!

But that’s not all! Beware of the all-new haunted Open World! Find all-new bubbling cauldrons, glowing Jack-o-Lanterns, cute-and-creepy craftables, pet accessories, and costumes!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s the holiday season in Crayola Create & Play and, because you’ve been extra nice this year, we’re celebrating with brand new decorations, activities, events and daily gifts!

A new ride has opened in Create & Play! Ride the Rainbow Rush and guide your pet as they plunge down a colorful slide filled with unexpected turns, jumps and obstacles!

The holidays have arrived in Create & Play! Enjoy the new decorations, and join us as we count down to the holidays in our Creativity Countdown!

It’s the holiday season in Crayola Create & Play and, because you’ve been extra nice this year, we’re celebrating with brand new decorations, activities, events and daily gifts!

A new ride has opened in Create & Play! Ride the Rainbow Rush and guide your pet as they plunge down a colorful slide filled with unexpected turns, jumps and obstacles!

The holidays have arrived in Create & Play! Enjoy the new decorations, and join us as we count down to the holidays in our Creativity Countdown!

title: Crayola Create & Play

creator: Crayola LLC
descriptionHtml:
Spark creativity with Crayola Create and Play!

Crayola Create and Play is the official Crayola app for kids ages 3 to 8, designed to develop creative confidence! Enjoy frequent new activities to help your child imagine, experiment, and grow with every month! Explore dozens of creative games and enjoy endless hours of productive play. Crayola Create & Play encourages curiosity, artistic independence, and is a safe place to develop self-expression. It’s so much more than drawing and coloring pages! Each of the activities is made to spark a creative point of view...because everyone can be creative! Our regular content updates for subscribers add new features, activities, & learning games. There’s always something new to explore!

MAKE YOUR MASTERPIECE
• Use REAL Crayola art tools to create your own masterpieces! Color, draw, doodle, paint, stamp, sticker, glitter, and more!
• From princesses, dinosaurs, and unicorns...to fairies, cats, robots, and race cars, there are fun art projects for all ages to enjoy.
• There’s more than coloring and painting in the art station! Stretch your creativity with pixel art, glow art, tracing, and art lessons too!
• Enjoy UNLIMITED coloring pages and activities, PLUS new content every month!
• See your art in your own personal gallery!

COLORS OF THE WORLD
• Celebrate diversity with Crayola’s award-winning, skin tone-accurate colors and coloring pages!

CREATE & PLAY WITH PETS
• Design your own pets and watch them come to life!
• Choose a home for them and watch them explore!
• Feed, wash, and interact with your pet in their habitat! Each one has its own unique personality.

EXPERIMENT & DISCOVER
• Match, mix, and delight in colors!
• Sort the crayons, become a color-slicing ninja!
• Grow your own color garden and attract real butterflies. Watch your garden come to life in the real world with the AR camera!
• Design your own dinosaurs, rocketships, masks and more with Craftables!

PLAY & WIN games in the Crayola Create & Play Arcade
• How many ice cream scoops can you stack in Scoop Stacks?
• Solve puzzles made from your own artwork!
• Play fun action games with your pets!

LEARN NEW SKILLS
• Try coding, practice spelling and letters, and watch behind-the-scenes videos on how Crayola Crayons are made.
• Watch professional artists teach new art and drawing techniques.

PLAY WITH A PURPOSE
• Inspired by STEAM and STEM education techniques, Crayola teaches core developmental principles through play.
• Coding exercises and games help spark excitement for science and math.

MONTHLY CONTENT UPDATES
• There's always something new to keep the inspiration flowing!

WHY SUBSCRIBE TO CRAYOLA CREATE AND PLAY?
When you subscribe to Create and Play Crayola app, you unlock full access to all activities, features, and content updates! Each activity is carefully developed to achieve our mission to help parents and educators raise inspired kids.

Subscription Details
A 7-day free trial is included with subscription. Subscription options include Monthly or Yearly periods. Monthly subscriptions are charged once per month and Yearly subscriptions are charged once per year. Subscriptions are charged at the beginning of the current period and auto-renewed 24 hours before the next period. With a 7-day free trial, your account is charged on the 7th day for the period which will begin on the 8th day.
• Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

Privacy Policy: www.crayola.com/app-privacy
Terms of Service: www.crayola.com/app-terms-of-use
If you have any questions, please visit www.crayola.com/support

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Join us January 23 - 29 as we celebrate Crayola Creativity Week in Create & Play! Come back every day during this special event week for exciting new content and daily activities that encourage creativity, learning, and personal growth. There's something new to play for free EVERY DAY! How many can you complete? Come create with us and enjoy a year full of productive play!

Love is in the air in Crayola Create & Play! We’ve decorated just in time for Valentine’s Day. Celebrate with us and go on a brand new, limited-time Valentine’s Day Quest! appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Board a mission to the stars and explore a whole new galaxy of creativity in Space: an all-new area that’s out of this world! Take a ride up to the space station in the stellar new elevator! Bust asteroids, explore the cosmos, defy gravity with your pets, or build your very own spaceships and planets with new craftable activities. Swing by the new fly-in movie theater and watch official NASA videos to learn more about outer space!

A 7-day free trial is included with subscription. Subscription options include Monthly or Yearly periods. Monthly subscriptions are charged once per month and Yearly subscriptions are charged once per year.
